data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

You ____ come ____ the ____ every Tuesday, ____ let ____ know ____ you can't make ____ for ____ reason. Please be prepared to discuss the book.
data.partBlankContent: If you want to be part of the book club, you must read the book that the group chooses. If t__ book i_ above yo__ reading le___, ple___ let t__ leader kn__. data.fullContent: If you want to be part of the book club, you must read the book that the group chooses. If the book is above your reading level, please let the leader know. You must come to the meeting every Tuesday, and let someone know if you can't make it for some reason. Please be prepared to discuss the book.
data.answer: 如果你想成为书友会的一员，你必须阅读书友会推荐的书。如果这本书超出了你的阅读水平，请让领导知道。你必须每周二都来参加会议，如果因为某种原因你不能来，就告诉别人。请准备好讨论这本书。
